Detailed Description

Class representing an Image.

Image is a middle structure used to contains the calculated colors during the rendering phase It possesses methods to save its content into an image formatted file, or to read one

Image::Image ( std::string  filename  ) 
Parameters:
filename : the name of the .TGA file to import into the project (for Bitmap textures)

This function creates an Image, which is the representation of a .TGA file with a matrix of pixels

Add a new pixel to the matrix.

Adds a color to a given position in the matrix.

Correponding pixel in the matrix receives the given color
